description: Better documentation navigation. Collapsible sidebar layout. Toggle button. Smooth transitions. Mobile-responsive with hamburger menu. Active section highlighting. Better UX for reading docs.

userStories.title: Create Collapsible Sidebar Layout
userStories.description: As a documentation reader, I want a collapsible sidebar so that I can maximize reading space.

userStories.title: Implement Mobile Menu
userStories.description: As a mobile user, I want a hamburger menu so that I can access docs navigation on small screens.

userStories.title: Highlight Active Section
userStories.description: As a documentation reader, I want the active section highlighted so that I know where I am.

userStories.title: Define Sidebar Structure
userStories.description: As a documentation reader, I want organized sidebar sections so that I can find topics easily.
acceptanceCriteria: Sidebar sections: Getting Started, Database, Authentication, Realtime, Storage, GraphQL, SDK, MCP Integration

userStories.title: Add Smooth Transitions
userStories.description: As a documentation reader, I want smooth transitions so that the UI feels polished.

userStories.title: Persist Sidebar State
userStories.description: As a documentation reader, I want sidebar state remembered so that it stays how I left it.
acceptanceCriteria: Default: expanded on desktop, collapsed on mobile

userStories.title: Add Table of Contents
userStories.description: As a documentation reader, I want a table of contents on the right so that I can navigate long pages.
acceptanceCriteria: TOC on right side of content

userStories.title: Breadcrumb Navigation
userStories.description: As a documentation reader, I want breadcrumbs so that I can navigate back up the hierarchy.

userStories.title: Copy Code Button
userStories.description: As a documentation reader, I want copy buttons on code blocks so that I can quickly copy examples.
acceptanceCriteria: Copy button on each code block

userStories.title: Add Keyboard Shortcut
userStories.description: As a documentation reader, I want a keyboard shortcut to toggle sidebar so that I can work faster.
